name: "Futurdog"
description:
Futurdog is a science-fiction comic about a dog making his way from a weird, depressing wasteland into a weird, overwhelming metropolis. 24 pages, black and white.

*Every copy will be inscribed to you (or whomever you designate), signed, and doodled in by the artist!*

**If there are particulars about the inscription or requests for doodles, include them in the notes field of PayPal or send me a message/email.**
